title: In Poland, Tusk mirrors the far right’s agenda
summary_full: The far right’s ascent has coincided with a noticeable rightward shift in Tusk’s rhetoric and policy priorities
summary_public: The far right’s ascent has coincided with a noticeable rightward shift in Tusk’s rhetoric and policy priorities

PL.label: negative
